```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
```

## Load the weather data


```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")
  
weather_df = weather_df %>%
  mutate(month = floor_date(date, unit = "month"))
```

## `group by`

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month) 
```

## counting things

count month observations

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  group_by(name, month) %>% 
  summarize(n_obs = n())
```

we can use `count()`

```{r}
weather_df %>% 
  count(name, month, name = "n_obs")
```

**NEVER** use base R's `table`

```{r, eval = FALSE}
weather_df %>% 
  pull(month) %>% 
  table()
```
